title: Roasted shoulder of pork with thyme and lemon salt, mash, spring greens and apple sauce
description: Pork shoulder is a fatty cut that's perfect for slow roasting because it stays wonderfully moist even after 6 hours in the oven.
ingredients: 4 Bramley apples, peeled and roughly chopped
700g/1lb 9oz King Edward potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
